channel.title: Can i join anyones server
channel.description:
i want to join the main server or a server thats works so i dont need to code anything
i keep making my own server or i cant connect to other when i put a random ip in
my ip is 127.0.0.1 thats server ip

item.title: Can i join anyones server
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

ok for Server IP: put in ahimscape.servegame.com so it would look like this

UserNme: TeasingPingu
Password:********
Server IP: Ahimscape.servegame.com

Read full topic

item.title: Can i join anyones server
item.dc:creator: @TeasingPingu TeasingPingu
item.description:
@TeasingPingu wrote:

but i srota have looked

when i am logging in it says

UserName:TeasingPingu
Password:********
Server IP:127.0.0.1

what can i put as a server ip coz i have looked and when i out an ip it says server offline or something/cannot connect

Read full topic

item.title: Can i join anyones server
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

go to RS2 SERVER ADVERTISMENT

and look in there for ips and the ip 127.0.0.1 is your own server no one else can connect to it

Read full topic
